main event: On 5 May 1949, two unidentified flying objects were observed at the Waco Firing Range #4, Fort Bliss, Texas.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be 3 inches in size, shaped like discs, and white in color., They were observed flying at an altitude of approximately 10,000 feet for about 30 to 50 seconds., The witnesses were military officers characterized as reliable and above reproach., The objects were said to be highly reflective and did not make any sound or leave a trail., Similar reports were referenced from earlier dates in April 1949, indicating ongoing sightings in the area.
